raw.reasoning: Direct messaging resolution is Relaycast-based in dashboard, so workers must be explicit Relaycast agents during their runtime, not inferred from local spawn state.

retrospective.summary: Registered worker agents in Relaycast on spawn/restart and released them on exit/release so dashboard direct messaging resolves via Relaycast presence
